text: Savvas Theodoridis (18 February 1935 â€“ 17 August 2020) was a Greek footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for Olympiacos between 1955 to 1963 and the Greek national team from 1957 to 1960. He was born in Athens. Theodoridis died on 17 August 2020 in Athens, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Athens
title: Savvas Theodoridis
